thread.title: Ciaran O Cleirigh
thread.title_full: Energia reviewed by Ciaran O Cleirigh

author: Ciaran O Cleirigh
title: Ciaran O Cleirigh
text:
Pricing / discount could be clearer. Bill shows gross unit cost and then a discount but the discount rate isn't shown, nor is the net unit price.
Reminders to submit meter reads could be sent a few days earlier so as to allow time to take and submit before the bill issues.
Minor issues it has to be said!
